review_data.title: Great new cuisine with newly

review_data.title: Great burger. Very friendly pub.
review_data.content: Very friendly and efficient staff with a very relaxed atmosphere. I enjoyed my lamb burger with sweet potato fries, a large portion of both burger and fries. They have a good choice of beers. The garden is a lovely place to sit and enjoy.

review_data.title: Great pub
review_data.content: Stop by here for great beer selection, outdoor tables and quiz night on Sundays. Friendly service and charming atmosphere. Highly recommend.

review_data.title: Average food

review_data.title: Nice irish pub
review_data.content: Shamrock is a nice irish pub with super friendly staff and good pub food. We had some burgers which are served with fries. The pub is located right at the tram station of Nr 7 and it takes about 20minutes to center of Zurich.

review_data.title: Shamrock: Great pub, good food

review_data.title: Thumbs up

review_data.title: Best Pub in Zurich!!

review_data.title: Shamrock😀😀😀😁

review_data.title: SHAMROCK ROCKS!!!

review_data.title: Still going strong!!

review_data.title: The best pub in Switzerland!!
